title: Expecting empty properties to be returned as null values when creating a RACING EVENT
gherkin:
When the user creates a "RACING EVENT" "GP Monaco" with the following data
  | key | value | datatype |
  | name | GP Monaco | string |
Then the response should contain the following properties
  | key | value | datatype |
  | name | GP Monaco | string |
  | round |  | number |
  | date_from |  | string |
  | date_to |  | string |
